name: - Preparing food (Nepal series #25) -
description:
The woman in the foreground is preparing some food, but does not have enough wood, so she asks the child to gather some dried yak poop to start the fire. People in this region are only allowed to collect the wood that has already fallen on the ground, but that is not enough to cook and keep warm. Therefore, they rely on their cattle to provide them with dung to dry in the sun.

This is in the village of Kyanjin Gumba.

5616px X 3744px
